transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Deepika?

Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji Khan sir?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Executive: Khan sir, main Pragya Bulati baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hmm boliye.
Executive: Ji aapka koi specific concern hai ki aapka catalog south mein nahi dikhna chahiye, correct?
Customer: Correct hai mam, lekin main IndiaMART se account close karna chahti hu main.
Executive: Kya ho gaya sir?
Customer: Mere ko pehle hi jhoot bol ke account khulwaya gaya.
Executive: Kis tarah ka jhoot bola aap bataiye?
Customer: Mere ko bola South mein nahi dikhega.
Customer: Haan bola dikhega hi nahi.
Executive: South mein nahi dikhega?
Customer: Pata chal gaya hai mam isliye main account close.
Executive: Actually south mein nahi dikhta hai jab tak ki koi south mein baitha hua buyer west Bengal na search kare.
Customer: Theek hai lekin madam madam pehle hi mere ko jhoot bol ke account khulwaya gaya.
Executive: Kya jhoot bola sir bataiye na kya jhoot bola?
Customer: Mam aap mera jo account manager hai usse bhi baat kiya mam sabko bol diya main baar baar ek hi baat bol bol ke main to thak gaya mam.
Executive: Achcha achcha. To aap mere ko pehle nahi bole. Haan boliye mam boliye aap boliye.
Customer: Bataiye sir kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Main bol raha hu mere ko bola south mein aapka account nahi dikhega. Hum bola hum pehle hi ek baar bola tha jo net google mein search karega to dikh jayega. Wo bola main aise kar dunga google mein search karega bhi nahi dikhega.
Customer: Chennai ka aadmi log. Hum bola aise to nahi ho sakta. Bola aise ho sakta hai.
Customer: Abhi usko call kiya jo account khulwaya. Wo abhi kya bol raha hai? Bola nahi dikhega jo search karega wo to google mein dikh jayega. Hum bola pehle tum bola abhi dikhega nahi ab bol raha hai dikhega. Ye to pura na insaafi wala baat ho gaya.

Executive: Okay.
Executive: To aapka decision final hai sir?
Customer: Haan decision final hai main account close karna chahti hu main.
Executive: Theek hai sir, okay. Aur iska refund ka kya hai?
Executive: Sir dekhiye refund mein ye hota hai ki hum request aage raise karte hain. Aapka pehle service stop hoti hai. Stop hokar aapka jo unused hai paisa wo figure out hota hai ki kitna paisa bacha hai. Us paise ko liye fir hum refund ka process shuru karte hain jisse hamari accounts team aur hamare management approve karti hai. To lagbhag isme 12 se 13 din lagte hain.
Customer: Theek hai mam koi tension nahi hai dekhiyega aur refund kitna aa sakta hai wo mere ko kab tak hoga 12 din?
Executive: Day by day.
Executive: Sir wo to day by day calculate hota hai na wo to pura system automated hai to wo dhang se wo usme koi gadbad jaane ka chance nahi hota.
Customer: Achcha achcha. Mera to itna to hua hi nahi hai 15 din 20 din hua hai.
Executive: Sir jitne bhi din hua hoga na wo wo wo sahi calculate karta hai system. Human being koi calculate nahi karta hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha. Theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek theek.
Customer: To mam wo upar aapse baat kar lijiye main account close karna chahti hu wo kya wo kya karna padega kya kare boliye.
Customer: Main aap logo se.
Executive: Theek hai mam jaise aap bolo jaise aap bolo mam.
Customer: To mam udhar se aap karwa dijiye account close.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Mera account mein paisa aa jayega kya mam?
Executive: Apne aap aayega jahan jis account se aapne pay kiya usi account mein aa jayega aur matlab isiliye fir hum ye proceed karte hain aapka confirmation hai?
Customer: Haan haan band kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai to main ye proceed kar rahi hu aur main aapko ye confirm kar rahi hu ki hum proceed kar rahe hain. Main apni team member se mail bhi dalwa rahi hu aapko taki aapko koi kuch puchna ho to unse directly puch sakte hain. To main aapka concern se close kar rahi hu kyuki concern rakh ke to koi fayda nahi hai aapka concern ka jo purpose tha wo humne aage initiate kar diya hai. Theek hai mam?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai okay mam okay good day.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Account was opened with false promises.

- Account manager misled about visibility in South India.

- Wants to close the account.

- Enquired about the refund process and timeline.



Resolution:

- Explained the refund process and timeline.

- Initiated the account closure process.

- Confirmed that the refund will be processed.

- Executive will send a confirmation email.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account closure, misleading information
